text: ke’a‘irabochi wede hwala lek’eruti belachewi፡- «yebiritu ch’ikane balebeti wede honu hizibochi (wigiya) wede fiti tit’it’eralachihu፡፡ tigadelwachewalachihu፤ weyimi yiselimalu፡፡ bititazezumi alahi melikami minidani yiset’achihwali፡፡ ke’ahuni befiti inide sheshachihu bitisheshumi asamamini k’it’ati yik’et’achihwali፡፡»
